text:
Hi,

I've installed lenya on resin server but when i click Editor's View link 
i get the following error can you please help me out. It is very urgent
bellow is error decription

Cannot get variable 'document-type' in expression 'cocoon:/lenyabody-view/
{page-envelope:publication-id}/{page-envelope:area}/{page-envelope:document-
type}{page-envelope:document-url}'
creator: r.ashish.m@gmail.com
gregor@apache.org
text: *** Bug 35220 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

need more information:

container version, jdk, endorsed libraries, what did you do to cause the exception?
creator: gregor@apache.org
r.ashish.m@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> need more information:
> container version, jdk, endorsed libraries, what did you do to cause the 
exception?

Hi,
   thanks for responding. You have bocome ray of hope. I'm using

jdk:    j2sdk1.4.2_04
resin:  resin-2.1.16
lenya:  apache-lenya-1.2.3

I've just lenya.war file in the webapps directory of resing server that's it.

Please respond ASAP

(In reply to comment #3)
> (In reply to comment #2)
> > need more information:

text: looks like a long dead issue.
